detaileddescription.para: QE bit is at bit6 in Status register 1
QE bit is at bit1 in Status register 2 register 2
QE bit is at bit7 in Status register 2
QE bit is in status register 2 and configured by CMD 0x31

briefdescription.para: determine whether the serial nor flash is busy

simplesect.para: hpm_stat_t: status_spi_nor_flash_is_busy if the serial nor flash is busy

briefdescription.para: set serial nor flash write enable

simplesect.para: hpm_stat_t: status_success if write enable success

briefdescription.para: erase the serial nor flash chip

simplesect.para: hpm_stat_t: status_success if erase chip success

briefdescription.para: erase the serial nor flash block using blocking transfer

simplesect.para: the erase block address must be block alignment

parameterdescription.para: the serial nor flash block address

simplesect.para: hpm_stat_t: status_success if erase block success

briefdescription.para: erase the serial nor flash sector using blocking transfer

simplesect.para: the erase sector address must be sector alignment

parameterdescription.para: the serial nor flash sector address

simplesect.para: hpm_stat_t: status_success if erase sector success

briefdescription.para: erase the serial nor flash block using nonblocking transfer

simplesect.para: the erase block address must be block alignment, it'not wait flash busy status.

parameterdescription.para: the serial nor flash block address

simplesect.para: hpm_stat_t: status_success if erase block success

briefdescription.para: erase the serial nor flash sector using nonblocking transfer

simplesect.para: the erase sector address must be sector alignment, it'not wait flash busy status.

parameterdescription.para: the serial nor flash sector address

simplesect.para: hpm_stat_t: status_success if erase sector success

briefdescription.para: erase the serial nor flash specified start address and length using blocking transfer

simplesect.para: the erase sector address must be sector alignment

parameterdescription.para: the serial nor flash sector address

briefdescription.para: program data to the specified serial nor flash address using blocking transfer

parameterdescription.para: the serial nor flash programming address

briefdescription.para: program data to the page nor flash address using nonblocking transfer

parameterdescription.para: the serial nor flash programming address

briefdescription.para: read the data of specified serial nor flash address

parameterdescription.para: the serial nor flash reading address

briefdescription.para: get the serial nor flash information

simplesect.para: hpm_stat_t: status_success if get information success
